messages.lang_original_description: You are reading the blog post in its original language.
messages.lang_manual_translation_description: You are reading a manual translation of the blog post.
messages.lang_unsupported: The blog post is displayed in its original language as translation has not been provided yet. If possible, please join our Github and Discord to help with translation. Thank you!
messages.url_copy_notice: Copied link to blog post to clipboard
messages.edit_intro: Found a typo or need to correct something?
messages.qr_description: Share and scan this code for quick access the blog post!
